question: According to the 1st edition of the NCAER Land Records and Services Index (2019-20), what is the rank of Maharashtra in terms of digitizing land records?
explanation: According to the 1st edition of the NCAER Land Records and Services Index (2019-20), the state of Maharashtra ranked third in terms of digitizing land records. The report was released by the National Council of Applied Economic Research. Madhya Pradesh topped the list.
